sentences.en: [as modifier]an out-of-court settlement.
sentences.cn: 私下了结。

sentences.en: A court at Tampa, Florida has convicted five officials on drugs charges.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达州坦帕市法庭判决5名官员的毒品交易罪名成立。

sentences.en: Chefs at the St James Court restaurant have cooked for the Queen.
sentences.cn: 圣詹姆斯皇家饭店的厨师们曾经为女王烹制菜肴。

sentences.en: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.cn: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.en: He can let the court's decision stand and permit the execution.
sentences.cn: 他有权维持法庭判决，批准死刑生效。

sentences.en: He could refer the matter to the high court.
sentences.cn: 他可以将此事交由高等法院裁决。

sentences.en: He is due to face a court-martial on drugs charges.
sentences.cn: 他将因毒品交易的指控受到军法审判。

sentences.en: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

sentences.en: In the squash court his chief aim is to flatten me.
sentences.cn: 在壁球场上他的主要目标就是击败我。

sentences.en: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.cn: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.en: She is equally at home on the singles or doubles court.
sentences.cn: 她单打和双打都能得心应手。

sentences.en: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.cn: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

sentences.en: That was back in the 1960s when we were courting.
sentences.cn: 那还是20世纪60年代我们在谈恋爱的时候。

sentences.en: The Appeal Court has quashed the convictions of all eleven people.
sentences.cn: 上诉法庭已经撤销对所有11人的判决。

sentences.en: The case is being referred to the Court of Appeal.
sentences.cn: 该案件将移交上诉法院审理。

sentences.en: The clay court was slippery and he was unable to move freely.
sentences.cn: 红土网球场很滑，他不能自如地移动。

sentences.en: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.cn: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.en: The Court has about 1,400 appeals on its docket.
sentences.cn: 法庭的备审案件约有1,400宗。

sentences.en: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.cn: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.en: The European Court's decision has been greeted with dismay by fishermen.
sentences.cn: 渔民对欧洲法庭的裁决感到失望。

sentences.en: The evidence was read out to the court in a dull monotone.
sentences.cn: 证据被当庭呆板地宣读了一遍。

sentences.en: the price would put it out of court for most private buyers.
sentences.cn: 这个价格会使大部分私人买主望而却步。

sentences.en: the royal courts of Europe
sentences.cn: 欧洲皇家宫廷

sentences.en: There was pandemonium in court as the judge gave his summing-up.
sentences.cn: 法官的结案陈词在法庭上引起一片混乱。

sentences.en: they are trying to settle the squabble out of court.
sentences.cn: 他们正试图私下解决争端。

words.tran_cn: 殷勤的；被承认的；出于礼节的
尊严而有礼貌的；奉承的；有宫廷气派的，威严的

phrases.tran_cn: 人民法院；人民法庭（美国一种电视节目）

trans.tran_cn: 法院，全体出庭人员，球场，王宫，公寓大楼，短街，宅第，大厅
trans.tran_en: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the  jury  who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

trans.tran_cn: 讨好，争取，求爱，博得，追求，导致，招致，奉承，恋爱
trans.tran_en: if a man and a woman are courting, they are having a romantic relationship and may get married

trans.tran_cn: 献殷勤， 讨好； 招致； 求爱
trans.tran_en: to try hard to please someone, especially because you want something from them
